_header: Hail prince royal most amiable in sight
Subjects: occasional verse; pageant verses; Arthur, prince of Wales
_description: Ceremonial verses at Coventry Pageant (1498) to welcome Prince Arthur — seven stanzas rhyme royal

CovLeet.First Lines:
Hayle prynce roiall most amyable in sightWhom the Court eternall
                    thurgh prudent governaunce…
CovLeet.Last Lines:
…That shuld your noble persone in eny wyse distraynWhich
                    welcome is to this your chamber & to me right fayn
CovLeet.Editions:
